EmailTemplate.name: India - Interview 1 Complete - Not Moving On
EmailTemplate.subject: Climate Corps: Application Status
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{{Fellow_Application__c.Applicant_First_Name__c}}},
Thank you for taking the time to meet with us to discuss your interests and qualifications for the Climate Corps program. Our fellow-matching team has interviewed many highly competitive and qualified applicants, making it especially difficult to narrow the applicant pool.
I am writing to inform you that your application is no longer under consideration for a position with Climate Corps for the 2024 India cohort. Due to the high volume of candidates, we are unable to provide further feedback on your individual application.
You remain a valuable member of the sustainability community and we wish you great success in making the world a more energy-efficient and environmentally conscious place. We hope you will stay in touch with the EDF community < https://business.edf.org/get-involved-with-edf/ > .
We appreciate your interest in the Climate Corps program and thank you for your time and consideration of this position.
Best regards,
The Climate Corps Team
EDFClimateCorps.org
*Please do not reply to this email. We will not respond to any inquiries sent to this address.
